example.caption: compute an indefinite integral
compute an indefinite integral that cannot be expressed in elementary terms
compute a definite integral
example.input: integrate sin x dx from x=0 to pi
example.caption: compute an improper integral
example.input: int e^(-t^2) dt, t=-infinity to infinity
example.caption: compute a multiple integral
example.input: integrate x^2 sin y dx dy, x=0..1, y=0..pi
int (x^2 y^2 + x y^3) dx dy, x=-2 to 2, y=-2 to 2
int sin^2 x + y sin z dx dy dz , x=0..pi, y=0..1, z=0..pi
example.caption: compute an integral over an unbounded region
example.input: int e^-(x^2+y^2) dx dy, x=-oo to oo, y=-oo to oo
example.caption: numerically integrate functions that cannot be integrated symbolically
example.input: integrate sin(cos x) from x=0 to 1
example.caption: find integral representations for a function
